actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the export of grain to any petroleum producing country which has petroleum production in excess of its domestic requirements, except pursuant to an agreement providing for the exchange of such grain for petroleum.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Export Administration Act, the export of grain to any petroleum producing country which has petroleum production in excess of its domestic requirements, as determined by the Secretary of Commerce, except pursuant to an agreement providing for the exchange of such grain for petroleum.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the export of grain to any petroleum producing country which has petroleum production in excess of its domestic requirements, except pursuant to an agreement providing for the exchange of such grain for petroleum.
